note:
For my day job, I do IT & teach computing at a primary school. I also dabble in youth work, stage lighting and activity (archery/air rifle) instructing.  I am a scout leader and spend a lot of time producing digital media and in-person events for my church for my local Methodist Church.

 This feed is likely to be a mishmash of topics, depending on what I am doing at the time!

Politically, I am liberal with lashings of leftyness!
